title: StyleGAN2 Interactive Webclient - Generator Settings
description: Configure a generator. Can be changed via the web interface.

numGenStylesPerLayer.title: Number of generated styles per layer

useSameStylesForAllLayers.title: Use same styles for all layers
useSameStylesForAllLayers.description: If true the style images per layer will look the same

reduceNumberOfLayersBy.title: Reduce number of layers by
reduceNumberOfLayersBy.description: Reducing the number of layers groups together layers in the view. e.g. if 2 layers are reduced the first and second displayed layer will actually be the first and second, and the third and fourth layers.

stylesFromImages.title: If present the generated styles will create images similar to these images. The images are stored in base64 encoding.

optimizeStyles.title: Intelligently generate styles
optimizeStyles.description: If not existent the styles will be generated randomly. If existent it is interpreted as evaluation model id. The styles will be randomly generated and then optimized to one end of the evaluator ratings.
